section.title: Anthony submitted this report to us: let's convert to a testimonial for online presentation
section.para: -- already applied for real industrial projects or proof-of-concept (collaboration with ReveR S.A. www.rever-sa.com) - COBOL code analyzers and transformers - Source code transformations in the context of database migration - COBOL files to relational database - CODASYL database to relational database - Program instrumentation for test case generation - DML code analyzers in the context of program slicing for data reverse engineering - Dataflow analysis of Embedded SQL in COBOL programs - Dataflow analysis of Call-based DB primitives in COBOL programs (on top of IMS or CODASYL databases) -- research prototypes - Definition of an abstract DML (LDA) and related coupled-transformations for data-intensive software evolution - Language definition - Type checking and consistency validation - Source code transformation rules propagated from schema transformations
